name: Deadly Surprise
description:
This is the first game jam where King Peng Studio decided to participate. We dedicated our spare time to the jam because we are all passionate game developers.

I want to say thanks to the team: Dennis, Hugo, Pete and Peter

Most of the assets in the game are developed by King Peng Studio, we have also used the More Mountain engine and some graphic assets that we own the license purchased from Game Dev Market.

We hope you all enjoy the project and provide a constructive feedback to all of us to learn from our mistakes and grow up stronger.
